extendedInfo.description: "Crash Course almost belongs on another console altogether, making it a small victory to get to play a game this beautiful and exciting game on the go." by Andrew Nesvadba / AppSpy.com - âââââ "Thanks to James Cameron 3D is all the rage right now and it seems some app developers are jumping onto the bandwagon. 'Crash Course' is an Asteroids style game that implements 3D for those that want it." by Chris Thomas / AppGamer.net "Crash Course : le shoot qui ramasse la mise" by iMike, Bebop / FunTouch.net - 9/10 "Crash Course is a very fun game, with lots of ways to play." by Richy / AllTechRelated.com - âââââ "A well-executed iPhone homage to an innovative twin-stick arcade shooter." by Ryan Hewson / GameZebo.com - ââââ "The graphics in this game are immensely great. The planets are well rendered with amazing fog effects in the atmosphere and well rendered enemies to match. Even with all these graphical effects, the game plays extremely smoothly on my second generation iPod touch." Jacques Burdet / TouchAholics.com - ââââ ----------------------------------------------- FEATURES - Swarms of asteroids and hordes of deadly enemies. - 3 fully upgradeable spectacular weapons. - Stunning visual effects. - Online high scores. - Casual, Arcade and Survival game modes. - Customizable graphical details. - 3D anaglyph glasses support. RED/CYAN, GREEN/MAGENTA. ----------------------------------------------- STORY They came from deepest space. A massive armada of alien vessels hidden amongst a cluster of asteroids. Their targets: vulnerable human colonists situated on unprotected planets. You are the only ship in the area capable of destroying the alien armada and saving the humans. Are you up for the challenge?----------------------------------------------- "Crash Course" is a fast-paced arcade space shooter. It is similar to the classic "Asteroids" titles.

reviews.title: Love the old school 3D :P
reviews.comment: Good !  Like the graphics (could be a lil bit better using 3D glass) lot of options are missing!  Like having story line would be awesome, or maybe just some achievements and score board!  But it on a really good way!  :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like the asteroid game on ps3
reviews.comment: I had to uninstall, reboot, then reinstall before it worked, lots of fun once it did!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Cannot wait for full game. Probably the best virtual thumbsticks I\'ve played on a mobile game. One suggestion though, can do with less lives. Finally got into the top 100 scoreboard on survival but it took ages! Not so bad on console but mobile gaming should be sort and sweet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s freaking amazing.
reviews.comment: U devs rock man! Keep up the good work. I would like to see more games like this with different map types like lava and jungle and city and stuff. Coooool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fan-f*cking-tastic
reviews.comment: Great DEMO, can\'t wait for the full version!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely Game!!
reviews.comment: One the most unique game out there for me!! Nice graphics and sound effects coupled with excellent controls. Can play it all day!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game. Waste a free mins on it but the 3d didn\'t work properly on it. Simple control system nice sound and graphics just a shame about about the 3d failing.  .L G G2X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hohoho this game make me crazy
reviews.comment: I hope this game will be coming with many world,level,power n stage by stage.. I really support this game so much! Everyone want more level n world..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb fun, must have
reviews.comment: It has really fun gameplay, but need more planets and weapons and ships. Possibly add a store system that players can use to buy from earning points in the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If I could give 100 stars I would
reviews.comment: This game is great not only is it a 3d game that plays well in my phone but it doesn\'t freeze frame at all. That plus it being fun. Amazing. I\'ve only rated 3 game out of the 20 to 30 I\'ve had and played but this one takes the cake.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: Update for EVO 3D so I don\'t need glasses,  and will I\'ll reinstall.... for now 3 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Demo
reviews.comment: Game with a lot of potential!... controls are a little sensitive with no option to adjust, and I\'d also like to see the world a little larger, but very fun game and pretty Super Stardust like.  Looking forward to purchasing the full game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beat
reviews.comment: I beated it... It is so easy and fun please make thr full version come out this year at least and thank u for this awesome game ...  :-D

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Been looking for ssd for a while now. Nice 1

reviews.title: Bug graphique
reviews.comment: A lot of  graphic bug on a galaxy nexus on jelly bean wish the dev can fix this cause the game is really fun !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: The 3D mode makes it much cooler, Good Job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where\'s the paid version?
reviews.comment: A fun stardust hd clone. Its a nice demo but when can we buy the full version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Super addictive game with GREAT graphics.  All the little details really add to the gameplay.  I\'d gladly pay for a stereoscopic version that would play in true 3D on phones like the EVO 3D or Optimus 3D.  In the meantime, I still can\'t see giving this game less five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Its basically Super Stardust(ps3) for Android, and by all that is holy its a decent attempt. As a big fan of SSD, I was a bit meh going in, but coming out of the loo an hour later, with pins and needles in my legs I am quite certain the full game is going to be friggin awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Amazing game!!! Runs very well on Asus  transformer prime.  Like some people have said this is a lot like stardust on the ps3. I love that game. What would make this game perfect is controller support. Most of the Tegrazone games have controller support. I use my ps3 controller to play many of them. Add blue tooth 6 axxis support and this game would mega rock.
reviews.author: A Google User
